t: Amazon says it’s permanently banned 600 Chinese brands for review fraud | The Verge
s: September 17, 2021 - Following the high-profile disappearances of Aukey, Mpow, RavPower, Choetech and more, Amazon now says it’s cracked down on 3,000 seller accounts across 600 Chinese brands over the past five months.

t: How Amazon's Wooing Of Chinese Sellers Is Killing Small American Businesses
s: March 17, 2017 - While Amazon makes a big public stance against counterfeiters, the reality is that brands continue being outcompeted by knock-offs of their own products in the marketplace -- which is putting many innovative American brands on the brink of going out of business.
